text.tspan: PLEASE!
STOP, AND NEVER
GIVE ACCESSIBILITY ASSETS
A PRICE / PAYWALL TO THEM!
THIS WILL (LIKELY) DISTURB ALL ACCESSING PEOPLE
MENTALITY
AND
DOWNGRADE THEIR LIFE
TO -1
Download this font: OpenDyslexic.org
Please! Life being dyslexia is also uncomfortable and bullyable!
So please for the love of God, respect those who requires unique accesses!
(& those financial may being/had became troubled because of this)
Direct SVG Upload test
Main SVG + Thumb SVG
FAIL! Thumb cannot SVG!
must be PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF
By JOELwindows7
Creative Commons 4.0
Attribution-Share Alike
Share this font to pay respecc & Deep Kilometer Condolence!
Hashing Dislike amount imminence
Despite the absence of dyslexia on JOELwindows7, He became furious as the price of
that dyslexic font is not $0. He insulted the creator of the font and who put the price
an idiotic expensivist finance cyberbullyer who financially bully unfortunate people.
Being dyslexia has advantages but also has cons. There is no different in discomfort
being a normal person who also has advantages but has cons. Matter is, what ability
does each instance has and what disadvantages do each one has.
This is what Superhero Anti-overpower balance rule looks like.
However, Joel was fortunate to discover the open source alternative to the font, OpenDyslexic.
It is $0, and Open Source. License is legit! We forgot but if not wrong, it was SIL something OpenFont.
And now, this is how it ends. Another happy ending for all.
There were no Dislike button as of upload this to the Claim. All you need to do to show some
support, is to either Tip (Strengthen Channel account for Search) or Support (Strengthen Claim for Search)
With absence of Dislike button (and Like Button), LBRYans will have much more space for creativity down
from the Negatively Pooppost, up to the Conciously priceless and precious masterpiece. All done and noone can
complain in just a click of a button except by comment with a potentially embarrasing "I dislike this claim!".
If they hated the claim, they'll just move away from there and nothing will happend. If they comment the hate / dislike
with either Anonymous or @ChannelName, it is all of the way to get embarrased for it, potentially. You cannot delete comment you posted as of now!
Joel and other people from young years old to elder years old are the victim of Dislike arrow rain. The effects given by the disliker are no joke, depression!
People had left the website and do something else in order to fix their depression. many failed and took all of their existing LIFE and Leave this pathetic server.
That's bad! But also not all willing to give up and managed to removed the stain out of their name. It is not an easy job! most multicelular being are believed
to be vulnerable to HOACCX and fell to the lies given by another multicellular being.
From Perkedel family, we do have favour to ask: If you wish to add reaction button, refrain from something like LIKE / DISLIKE!!! Use something like Facebook's Reaction.
Pioneered by Mark Zuckerberg and fellow, Reaction like this has 6 different mood: THUMBS UP, HEART, EXDEE, WHOAHOW, SADD, ANGERY!!!. The Angery one I should point out

could be vaguely meaned to either dislike or supporting author's anger over someone pathetically bullyiing an innocent. We are comfortable with such vagueness, so if they receive Angery, the author may still be happy

because this mood cannot be explicity interpreted to something specific. People can hate things, they should be able to vote for that while at the same time, the author may not be triggered as possible.
application lag during edit large text!
